english.segment1: Sometimes we fall. Ain't nothing new to me. Don't care move on. I must say you gave up for this time now
english.segment2: Stop tell me where you going. Maybe the one you love isn't there. You're going under. But you're over it all so you don't care about all that I had to see. Watch you wait until you come around. Around
english.segment3: Don't close your eyes. You need to see it all. It's no surprise. That they break you down. Least they won't give you up
english.segment4: Stop tell me where you going. Maybe the one you love isn't there. You're going under. But you're over it all so you don't care about all that I had to see. Watch you wait until you come around
english.segment5: It's all wonderful. Living happily. To lose it all. Think you have everything
english.segment6: Stop tell me where you going. Maybe the one you love isn't there. You're going under. But you're over it all so you don't care about all that I had to see. Watch you wait until you come around. Around
english.segment7: Stop tell me where you going. Maybe the one you love isn't there. You're going under. But you're over it all so you don't care about all that I had to see. Watch you wait until you come around. Around
